Condor::

Condor fell inside a forest, trees cushioned the impact. Condor stood 
up and tottering he walked, still he was trying to find a hide-place. 
Pain was high. he knew that unless he found a hide-place, they would 
find him and he would be re-captured... after that he didn't know 
what would happen.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> ::Switchblade::
> Switchblade holds on with all his might, but to no avail, "Damn," 
He 
> says as missiles knock him off of Condor. when he steadies 
> himself in mid air, he fires twice from his laser pistol, and a 
little 
> red lens appears over his right eye. The Spider moves towards 
> where Condor will land.
>

> 
> > Condor:
> >

just 
> > move his wings towards Switchblade and shot 2 feather missiles.

grabs
